name: Spring King
description:
This game is a submission for the "Mini Jam 73: Power" game jam.

The word for inspiration was "Power", and the limitation was "Only 5 colours". 

To fit the limitation, I've used:

0x353C21 (dark yellow-green)

0x000000 (black)

0xFF0000 (red)

0xFFFFFF (white)

0x808080 (grey)

My process for design was to try looking at various ideas pertaining to power, such as electricity, influence, energy, abilities, and my idea come from storing work energy, which brought about the spring idea. 

I came up with a few simple enemy ideas, but having to time physics jumps with ai movement wasn't too fun (if I was a better designer, I could probably work around it, but I'm not), so I removed all obstacles and just set up a goal with some items to play around with.
